title: How do historians see the defeat of Napoleon in Acre in 1799? Did that change the course of history? - Quora

response.answer_text: If this was a Victory instead of a defeat then yes, History it is possible could have looked far different as the British Empire was still decades before realization. A crushing French Victory here and there would be no “easy route through the Suez” through which the British Royal Navy could suddenly explode upon the World with as Imperial France would now have that as a possession.
If this was a Victory instead of a defeat then yes, History it is possible could have looked far different as the British Empire was still decades before realization.
